title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 179-3.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 179-3.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of the Division for Youth's temporary release
programs is to afford eligible and suitable residents the opportunity to
enhance rehabilitative efforts through selected, unescorted, off-grounds
activities and programs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
179-3.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
